A new analysis of satellite images shows almost all of Haiti's original forests are gone NPR's Dan Charles reports that researchers say the country's deforestation could be complete within Twenty years

Today's decision comes after five years of deliberations on steel coal the decision deeply regrettable Japan's foreign minister is threatening counter measures saying the ruling violates Nineteen sixty five treaty that was supposed to settle the issue and restored diplomatic ties
